analysis_age: "Ideal candidate is a recent college grad or has 1+ years experience" favours younger candidates.
analysis_feminine: "Driven by empathy," "humility and kindness," and "fulfilled by helping other people" are stereotypically feminine traits.
analysis_general: "A great sense of humor required": what constitutes a "great sense of humor" can be highly subjective and culturally specific.
text: We're looking for a Claims Experience Champion to join our team. If you're an energized, highly motivated, and get-shit-done kind of person who is driven by empathy, this one's for you. In your typical day, you'll manage customer communications for our claims experience team, bridging the gap between the insurance world and policyholders. We will look to you to deliver delightful experiences to our customers via email and phone. Patience, good writing skills, and a great sense of humor required. Requirements. Humility and kindness. You are fulfilled by helping other people. All around team player, fast self-learning individual. Very strong written and verbal communication skills. Affinity for lovable brands, you *get. what it takes to create a memorable customer experience. Loves getting shit done! Passion for working for a start-up that is disrupting an industry. Hungry to learn and grow within Lemonade. Ideal candidate is a recent college grad or has 1. years experience working in a customer service environment About Lemonade Lemonade is a licensed insurance carrier offering renters, homeowners, life, and pet insurance in the United States, contents and liability insurance in Germany and the Netherlands, and renters insurance in France. We're powered by artificial intelligence and behavioral economics, and driven by social good. A Certified B-Corp, Lemonade donates unused premiums to nonprofits selected by its community as part of our annual Giveback program. #06022021.

We're powered by artificial intelligence and behavioral economics, and driven by social good.
